reviews.review_text: It is a great pleasure to get to work with Tatiana! She has a vast array of experience in the fields of healing, coaching, and has helped me greatly to improve my emotional well-being and life balance. I collaborated with her through emotional image therapy, art therapy, and other methods. We did amazing exercises that brought out many emotions, which always resulted in a cleansing and healing energy that allowed me to have a new, fresh perspective on life and how to tackle everyday problems; whether it was in my daily routines, with friends and family, or in the workplace. It is clear that Tatiana truly cares, and I would highly recommend her services for those looking for help and intuitive guidance.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your trust, Stas, appreciate your review. Stay well!

reviews.review_text: Tatiana provided a lot of useful information and offered guidance  in questions that occupied my mind. Dealing with Life in Glow was pleasant, easy and insightful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Yulia! Wishing you all the best in your life transitions. It was a pleasure to collaborate with you

reviews.review_text: My experience with Tatiana came from my life crises such as divorce. I was experiencing broken heart symptoms and I was very depressed and down . I met Tatiana through online search from her website Life in Glow and I found from the first time that Tatiana has very  positive peaceful energy. I had a session with Metaphorical associative cards. ( MAK) We had many  sessions during a year period. I love my experience with Tatiana and  i will recommend her therapy to anyone who need it. It was very interesting to find the solutions from my subconscious mind and open the idea to my inner soul. I would encourage anyone who is searching for emotional peace and calm to book a session with her. Thank you Tatiana it was very interesting and I am in love with the MAK cards now, and looking forward to see you again Sent from my iPhone
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Valeria! It was a pleasure to collaborate  . Hope this new chapter will bring good things into your life.

reviews.review_text: Always great connecting with Tatiana! This was a very interactive session, which I appreciate so much. The information was accurate and helpful, validating a lot of my questions. It gave me a lot to come back to and revisit, and this is when I really get more ahas. The reading was jam packed full of juicy information interpreted by Tatiana reading my chart, as well as intuitive information that comes through her. She has a remarkable talent for reading Astrology, that I feel is strongly backed up by her intuitive coaching work, and extensive knowledge in other healing modalities.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Stefanie! It was a treat to collaborate as always

reviews.review_text: I enjoyed very much my Metaphorical Associative Cards (MAC) session with Tatiana. It was the first time that I heard about MAC so I did not know what to expect but I enjoyed and got a welcoming, fresh perspective from it. The artwork on the cards, some chosen on purpose and other ones at random, helped me to talk about the career change that Im currently going through. The discussions helped further define what Im looking for in my ideal/dream job and clarifying some decisions that I have made. Moreover, Tatiana is a great facilitator, easy to talk to, open, kind and sincere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ingrid for your trust and review! Look forward to see more of your beautiful work and wish you the best of luck and lots of success.

reviews.review_text: Tatyana advised me during a very difficult, transitional period of my life, when I separated from my husband. Literally brought me back to life. She studied my natal chart in great detail and directed my thoughts in the right direction. Thanks to the consultation, I identified areas of activity in which I could reveal myself and demonstrate my abilities, which is what I am now successfully doing.

I had a consultation on a natal chart with several queries and Tanya answered them 200% out of 100! I don t know how, but I even touched on topics that I thought about but didn t voice. It feels like everything is falling into place. She approached everything very thoroughly, carefully leads the session, you can feel sincere immersion and interest! But the main thing is what conclusions I made and where to go for at least the next couple of years. Because of the events in Ukraine, I had to start my life from scratch and of course there were questions about whether I should continue to engage in the same activities and whether I was on my way, the consultation helped me understand all this Many thanks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Katya! Thank you Katya, good luck with your projects!

reviews.review_text: I would like to express my deep gratitude to Tatyana for the session she conducted with me. Tatyana is not only a very beautiful girl, but also an expert in her field, her professionalism is felt in every word. Tatyana s competently structured conversation allowed me not to get lost in my requests and to determine the one that is truly relevant at this moment in life. Her friendliness, calm and confident communication style, and sincere desire to lead the client to awareness allowed me to determine a new vector for the development of relationships with the world and with myself. Thank you!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, Tatyana, for your kind words  . Im glad you found the session useful

reviews.review_text: Acquaintance with Tatyana Balashova happened at the training of emotional-imaginative therapy. During the practice, real situations and  live  requests were analyzed. Tatyana is a sensitive and attentive therapist who can not only hear and listen, but also has real tools for resolving internal conflict and harmonizing the emotional state. I recommend !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your trust and feedback, Anna!

reviews.review_text: Many thanks to Tatyana for the session with MAK! I went with only requests, and during the session Tatyana identified my real, real request at the moment, which worries me the most. And all this is very neat and delicate, without any tension) What s especially pleasing is that we finally came to an understanding of the problem of choice that stood before me, and then, with the help of MAK, thanks to Tatyana s guiding questions, we arrived at the desired solution! I am very pleased! And, what is important for me, Tatyana is a very sensitive and environmentally friendly specialist; I feel like I ve known her for 100 years) it s very comfortable to communicate while working! Once again, thank you very much for your help in solving the problem, I recommend Tatyana to everyone as a great specialist in her field!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your trust Tatyana!

reviews.review_text: Thanks to Tatyana for the work - it turned out very interesting! I liked that the methodology was selected according to my request - initially I came to the session on metaphorical cards, but in the process of work it became clear that EOT would be better suited for solving the problem. The EOT method is unique, but working with Tatyana was easy and environmentally friendly. Good support and at the same time complete immersion in work. I am pleased!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Julia! It was interesting to collaborate. Your session was unique

reviews.review_text: I want to thank you for working with me through metaphorical cards and emotional-imaginative therapy. These sessions gave me the opportunity to look at my difficulties from a new angle, and I gained a greater understanding of where to move next. Thank you for your attentive and careful accompaniment in this difficult study. Our work helped me clarify my request and see the steps through which I was able to ultimately achieve the desired result. Thank you so much
